_meta.title: Life Path & Destiny 인생경로
_meta.description: Explore your soul's journey, life purpose, and destined path through tarot wisdom

The Fool.life_path_meaning: You are at the beginning of a major life chapter. Your soul chose this incarnation to learn through new experiences and fearless exploration. Trust the universe's plan for you.
The Fool.korean: 당신의 영혼은 새로운 경험을 통해 배우기 위해 이 생을 선택했습니다. 두려움 없이 앞으로 나아가세요.
The Fool.soul_lesson: Learning to trust life itself without needing guarantees
The Fool.life_stage: New beginnings, fresh starts, major life transitions
The Fool.timing: A significant new chapter is beginning - within 3-6 months
The Fool.advice: Take the leap. Your soul knows where it needs to go, even if your mind doesn't yet understand.

The Magician.life_path_meaning: You have been given all the tools needed to manifest your destiny. Your life purpose involves creation, leadership, and bringing ideas into reality.
The Magician.korean: 당신은 운명을 실현하는 데 필요한 모든 도구를 갖추고 있습니다. 창조하고 이끌어가세요.
The Magician.soul_lesson: Mastering the power of conscious creation and willful manifestation
The Magician.life_stage: Active manifestation period, skill development, taking initiative
The Magician.timing: Now is the time to act - your power is at its peak
The Magician.advice: Stop waiting for permission. You already have everything you need to begin.

The High Priestess.life_path_meaning: Your life path involves deep intuition and hidden knowledge. You are meant to be a keeper of wisdom, bridging the seen and unseen worlds.
The High Priestess.korean: 당신의 인생 경로는 깊은 직관과 숨겨진 지식을 포함합니다. 보이는 세계와 보이지 않는 세계를 연결하는 역할입니다.
The High Priestess.soul_lesson: Trusting inner knowing over external validation
The High Priestess.life_stage: Period of inner development, spiritual awakening, hidden knowledge
The High Priestess.timing: Wait for more information - clarity will come within weeks
The High Priestess.advice: The answers you seek are already within. Be still and listen.

The Empress.life_path_meaning: Your destiny involves nurturing, creating, and bringing abundance into the world. You are meant to embody the creative, fertile force of life.
The Empress.korean: 당신의 운명은 양육하고, 창조하고, 풍요를 가져오는 것입니다. 생명의 창조적 힘을 구현하세요.
The Empress.soul_lesson: Learning to receive as gracefully as you give
The Empress.timing: Seeds planted now will flourish - nurture what matters
The Empress.advice: Create beauty. Nurture growth. Trust in life's abundance.

The Emperor.life_path_meaning: Your life purpose involves building lasting structures, leading others, and establishing order from chaos. You are meant to be a foundation for others.
The Emperor.korean: 당신의 삶의 목적은 지속적인 구조를 구축하고 다른 사람을 이끄는 것입니다.
The Emperor.soul_lesson: Balancing power with wisdom and authority with compassion
The Emperor.timing: Time to take charge and create lasting structures
The Emperor.advice: Build something that will outlast you. Lead with integrity.

The Hierophant.life_path_meaning: Your path involves tradition, teaching, and spiritual guidance. You are meant to bridge ancient wisdom with modern understanding.
The Hierophant.korean: 당신의 길은 전통, 가르침, 영적 안내를 포함합니다.
The Hierophant.soul_lesson: Finding your own truth within traditional frameworks
The Hierophant.timing: Seek guidance from mentors and established wisdom
The Hierophant.advice: Honor tradition while finding your unique expression of truth.

The Lovers.life_path_meaning: Your life journey centers on choices, relationships, and the integration of opposites. Major decisions define your path.
The Lovers.korean: 당신의 인생 여정은 선택, 관계, 그리고 반대의 통합을 중심으로 합니다.
The Lovers.soul_lesson: Making choices aligned with your deepest values
The Lovers.life_stage: Major life decisions, significant relationships, value clarification
The Lovers.timing: A crucial choice approaches - choose with your heart and head aligned
The Lovers.advice: Choose what aligns with your soul, not just your circumstances.

The Chariot.life_path_meaning: Victory through determination defines your path. You are meant to overcome obstacles through willpower and focused direction.
The Chariot.korean: 결단력을 통한 승리가 당신의 길을 정의합니다. 의지력과 집중된 방향으로 장애물을 극복하세요.
The Chariot.soul_lesson: Directing opposing forces toward a unified goal
The Chariot.timing: Push forward now - victory is within reach
The Chariot.advice: Take the reins. Direct your life with purpose and determination.

Strength.life_path_meaning: Your destiny involves mastering inner power through patience and compassion, not force. True strength is gentle.
Strength.korean: 당신의 운명은 인내와 연민을 통해 내면의 힘을 마스터하는 것입니다.
Strength.soul_lesson: Taming your inner beasts with love rather than suppression
Strength.life_stage: Inner mastery, patience, gentle power, self-control
Strength.timing: Patience now yields lasting results later
Strength.advice: Lead with compassion. Your gentleness is your greatest strength.

The Hermit.life_path_meaning: Solitary wisdom and inner illumination mark your path. You are meant to find truth through introspection and share your light with others.
The Hermit.korean: 고독한 지혜와 내면의 조명이 당신의 길을 표시합니다.
The Hermit.soul_lesson: Finding your own light and learning when to share it
The Hermit.life_stage: Introspection, solitary seeking, inner wisdom, guidance
The Hermit.timing: Step back from the world to find clarity
The Hermit.advice: Seek solitude. Your answers lie within the quiet.

Wheel of Fortune.life_path_meaning: Your life is marked by significant cycles and turning points. Destiny moves through you in waves of change and opportunity.
Wheel of Fortune.korean: 당신의 삶은 중요한 순환과 전환점으로 표시됩니다. 운명은 변화와 기회의 파도를 통해 당신을 통과합니다.
Wheel of Fortune.soul_lesson: Flowing with life's changes rather than resisting them
Wheel of Fortune.life_stage: Major turning points, fate in motion, karmic cycles
Wheel of Fortune.timing: A significant turning point is here - be ready to adapt
Wheel of Fortune.advice: Trust the wheel. What rises must fall, and what falls will rise again.

Justice.life_path_meaning: Truth, balance, and fairness define your life path. You are here to learn about cause and effect, karma, and righteous action.
Justice.korean: 진실, 균형, 공정함이 당신의 인생 경로를 정의합니다.
Justice.soul_lesson: Taking full responsibility for your choices and their consequences
Justice.life_stage: Karmic balancing, legal matters, truth-seeking, accountability
Justice.timing: Decisions made now have long-lasting karmic implications
Justice.advice: Act with integrity. The scales always balance in the end.

The Hanged Man.life_path_meaning: Your path requires surrender and seeing life from a different perspective. Sacrifice leads to illumination.
The Hanged Man.korean: 당신의 길은 항복과 다른 관점에서 삶을 보는 것을 필요로 합니다.
The Hanged Man.soul_lesson: Finding wisdom through willing sacrifice and perspective shifts
The Hanged Man.life_stage: Suspension, waiting, new perspectives, spiritual initiation
The Hanged Man.timing: Pause and surrender - forcing will backfire
The Hanged Man.advice: Let go of control. The new perspective you need comes through surrender.

Death.life_path_meaning: Transformation is central to your destiny. You are here to learn the art of letting go and embracing rebirth.
Death.korean: 변화가 당신의 운명의 중심입니다. 놓아주고 재탄생을 받아들이는 것을 배우세요.
Death.soul_lesson: Embracing endings as necessary doorways to new beginnings
Death.life_stage: Major transformation, endings, rebirth, letting go
Death.timing: Something must end for the new to begin - within 1-3 months
Death.advice: Release what has died. Make room for what wants to be born.

Temperance.life_path_meaning: Your life purpose involves integration, healing, and finding the middle way. You are meant to be a bridge between extremes.
Temperance.korean: 당신의 삶의 목적은 통합, 치유, 중도를 찾는 것입니다.
Temperance.soul_lesson: Blending opposing forces into harmonious wholeness
Temperance.timing: Take your time - patient blending yields the best results
Temperance.advice: Find the middle way. True magic happens in the balance.

The Devil.life_path_meaning: Your path involves confronting shadow, breaking chains, and understanding the nature of bondage and freedom.
The Devil.korean: 당신의 길은 그림자와 대면하고, 사슬을 끊고, 속박과 자유의 본질을 이해하는 것입니다.
The Devil.soul_lesson: Recognizing self-created prisons and choosing liberation
The Devil.life_stage: Shadow work, breaking patterns, confronting addictions
The Devil.timing: Face what binds you now - liberation awaits
The Devil.advice: Name your chains. Awareness is the first step to freedom.

The Tower.life_path_meaning: Sudden awakening and destruction of false structures mark your path. You learn through crisis and breakthrough.
The Tower.korean: 갑작스러운 각성과 거짓 구조의 파괴가 당신의 길을 표시합니다.
The Tower.soul_lesson: Finding liberation through the destruction of illusions
The Tower.timing: Expect the unexpected - upheaval brings liberation
The Tower.advice: Let the false structures fall. What remains is true.

The Star.life_path_meaning: Hope, healing, and divine inspiration mark your destiny. You are meant to be a beacon of light for others.
The Star.korean: 희망, 치유, 신성한 영감이 당신의 운명을 표시합니다.
The Star.soul_lesson: Maintaining hope and faith even in the darkest times
The Star.timing: The storm has passed - healing and hope flow freely now
The Star.advice: Pour your healing light freely. You have more than enough to share.

The Moon.life_path_meaning: Your path winds through mystery, illusion, and the depths of the unconscious. You must learn to navigate uncertainty.
The Moon.korean: 당신의 길은 신비, 환상, 무의식의 깊이를 통과합니다.
The Moon.timing: Wait for clarity - things are not as they seem
The Moon.advice: Trust your instincts through the fog. The path will become clear.

The Sun.life_path_meaning: Joy, success, and radiant vitality define your life purpose. You are meant to shine and bring warmth to others.
The Sun.korean: 기쁨, 성공, 빛나는 활력이 당신의 삶의 목적을 정의합니다.
The Sun.soul_lesson: Expressing authentic joy and allowing your light to shine
The Sun.timing: Success is here - step into the light and celebrate
The Sun.advice: Shine without apology. Your joy is contagious.

Judgement.life_path_meaning: Awakening, calling, and rebirth mark your destiny. You are here to answer your soul's calling and rise to your highest potential.
Judgement.korean: 각성, 부름, 재탄생이 당신의 운명을 표시합니다.
Judgement.soul_lesson: Answering your higher calling and rising from the past
Judgement.timing: Answer the call now - this is your moment of awakening
Judgement.advice: Rise to your calling. The universe is summoning your highest self.

The World.life_path_meaning: Completion, integration, and wholeness define your path. You are here to achieve mastery and experience the fullness of life.
The World.korean: 완성, 통합, 전체성이 당신의 길을 정의합니다.
The World.soul_lesson: Integrating all experiences into wisdom and wholeness
The World.timing: A major cycle completes - celebrate before the next begins
The World.advice: Celebrate your journey. You have arrived, and a new adventure awaits.

spread_positions.past_life_influence: What past-life karma shapes your current path
spread_positions.soul_purpose: Your core soul purpose in this lifetime
spread_positions.current_lesson: The lesson you are currently learning
spread_positions.upcoming_challenge: The challenge approaching on your path
spread_positions.hidden_gift: A hidden gift waiting to be discovered
spread_positions.destiny_direction: The direction your destiny is pulling you
